# Body

**Associated Type**

The type of view representing the body of this formatting definition.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Body : AttributedTextFormattingDefinition
```

## Discussion

When you create a custom definition, Swift infers this type from your implementation of the required [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/AttributedTextFormattingDefinition/body-1b01t] property.
